dialogueLines.line: Hey, I think I recognize you.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: You're that one guy Dearie hired to take care of the blue-haired midget.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: And you ended up sparing him.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: Well, it's not like it matters that much to me. He only paid you the equivalent of pocket money.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: Still, you've piqued my curiosity now.
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: How about we get a little more acquainted with each other?
dialogueLines.speaker: mom

dialogueLines.line: If by that, you mean getting acquainted with my gun, then sure.
dialogueLines.speaker: pico
